item.title: Hawk 2.0 and Beyond
item.description: This presentation was given at openSUSEconf 2016 in Nuremberg, Germany. In it, I presented Hawk 2.0, demonstrating how to set up a live cluster and showing off some of the new features in the second major release. Around this time I also created a website for Hawk which unfortunately (as of January 2020) hasn't been updated since: https://hawk-ui.github.io/

item.title: Exploring History with Hawk
item.description: Hawk is a web frontend for the ClusterLabs HA stack. This is a presentation of the History Explorer feature which I did at openSUSEconf 2015.
